thread.section_title: Arts and Entertainment coverage for all ages and interests - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: MMA monarch struggles to hold on to his ‘Kingdom’
thread.title_full: MMA monarch struggles to hold on to his ‘Kingdom’ - San Francisco Chronicle

author: David Wiegand
title: MMA monarch struggles to hold on to his ‘Kingdom’
text:
Photo: Justin Lubin Frank Grillo as Alvey Kulina Frank Grillo as Alvey Kulina
DirecTV’s “Kingdom” had to struggle a bit in its first season to establish its own identity as something other than a “Ray Donovan” knockoff, but it succeeded through strong, character-based writing and gritty, naturalistic plot development. Now the show about mixed martial arts faces a tougher second round, as it premieres Wednesday, Oct. 14, on DirecTV and on the digital Audience Channel. Frank Grillo as Alvey Kulina Frank Grillo as Alvey Kulina
